original_text: But the eye of their God was watching over the elders of the Jews, and they were not stopped until a report could go to Darius and his written reply be received.
korean_text: 하나님이 유다 장로들을 돌보셨으므로 그들이 능히 공사를 막지 못하고 이 일을 다리오에게 아뢰고 그 답장이 오기를 기다렸더라

sentences.original_text: But the eye of their God
was watching over the elders of the Jews
until a report could go to Darius
and his written reply be received
